about_the_game:
The soundtrack for PROJECT : KNIGHT™ 2 Dusk of Souls contain 13 tracks that can be heard throughout all of the game... From the title screen to the hub world all of the tracks have a dark atmospheric vibe that will fill you with nostalgia if you like the gender...

This DLC is included in the Deluxe Edition Bundle too...

To find the bonus content, locate the Steam Apps folder, open it and locate the Common folder, open it. Locate the game folder and all this content will be within the Bonus Content folder...

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*
